Articles.Content:
It's a Kerbal version of the Ares V. Unmanned satellite.

...

WHY CANT I POST ATTACHMENTS?!?!?!?!

you have to get a image posting site like tumblur and imgur, both of which are free. Just click the Insert Image button on the middle bar underneath the smiley face. Paste your URL there and should be good.

It should look like {IMG}www.exaple.com{/IMG} just replace {} with []

Hope this helps, web links are the little globe thing next to it
